title: UAPF Manifest
description: Top-level manifest describing the contents of a UAPF package.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UAPF package.

name.description: Human readable name of the process or package.

version.description: Semantic version of the package contents.

modified.description: Last modified timestamp for the manifest.

process.description: Relative paths to BPMN/CMMN process definitions.

decisions.description: Relative paths to DMN decision models and glossary files.

agents.description: Relative paths to agent role, capability, and binding definitions.

integration.description: Relative paths to integration resources including MCP and A2A schemas.

metadata.description: Relative paths to metadata files such as provenance or compliance.
